1559424911_17ig1FpuxY5dVESXxUpYN88oxLzZN.body:
You could also indicate as a peer that you accept new sites so that the client can automatically upload your site to these peers.

But I don't think it's a good idea for multiple reasons, a better notification system for new sites is a better idea so random people who are interested can visit these sites.
